title: How to Be Funny to a Guy over Text: 12 Ways to Make Him Laugh

steps.title: Send a text that’s cute and silly to make your guy smile.
steps.content: Send a text that’s cute and silly to make your guy smile. Sometimes, a cheesy text is the best way to go because it shows you don’t take yourself too seriously. Here are a couple more examples to choose from: “Are you a loan? Because you’ve got all my interest.” [2] X Research source “Are you a charger? Because I’m dying for you.”

steps.title: Use a pun to add playful energy into a conversation.
steps.content: Use a pun to add playful energy into a conversation. Sure, puns can be a little silly, but humor can deepen your bond and leave you both smiling. [3] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 28 September 2021. You can even start a pun-off to see who can come up with the punniest responses. “If you were a veggie, you’d be a cute-cumber.” “You must be Australian because you meet all my koala-fications.” Reader Poll: We asked 1001 wikiHow readers about the best ways to build a connection with someone they like over text, and only 10% of people recommended bringing up super deep, philosophical topics . [Take Poll] Instead, keep it light, fun, friendly, and sweet—save the serious topics for in-person conversation!

steps.title: Add flattery into your jokes to make him feel good about himself.
steps.content: Add flattery into your jokes to make him feel good about himself. Guys like getting compliments! [4] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 22 September 2021. You can use these lines on a guy you want to ask out, or send a funny compliment to your boyfriend to add flirty energy to his day. [5] X Research source “I believe in following dreams. So...can I get your Instagram?” “Glad I have my library card. All I wanna do is check you out.”

steps.title: Tease him to add a flirty edge to the conversation.
steps.content: Tease him to add a flirty edge to the conversation. Use gentle sarcasm to let him know you’ve got a playful sense of humor and can keep him on his toes. [6] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 28 September 2021. If you’re worried about how he’ll interpret the message, add a 😂 or 😉 emoji to clarify that you’re joking and having fun. [7] X Research source “You know, I had a rule about never dating a Mets’ fan. Guess I made an exception for you.” “It’s too bad I don’t like dating guys who are cuter than me.”

steps.title: Combine humor with a challenge to keep him interested.
steps.content: Combine humor with a challenge to keep him interested. The secret to building attraction is to mix excitement and fun with tension. [8] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 22 September 2021. A fun text like this example lets you compliment the guy without being too easy on him. “Miss you? Who said anything about me missing you? 😉” “👀 That classic charm won’t work on me. You’ll have to try something else.”

steps.title: Text a nerdy or geeky pickup line to appeal to your favorite brainiac.
steps.content: Text a nerdy or geeky pickup line to appeal to your favorite brainiac. A nerdy text shows off your cute, wholesome side, and it’ll prove to your guy that you appreciate his intellectual side. Bonus points if you can reference his favorite fandom or an element of nerd culture. [9] X Research source “I want our love to be like pi. Irrational and endless.” “All I want to do is curl up and watch Harry Potter with you because I ​​a-Dumbledore you.”

steps.title: Use emojis to liven up your texts.
steps.content: Use emojis to liven up your texts. You can let emojis add flair to your puns or even make jokes based wholly on emojis. Here are a few examples: [10] X Research source “Hi. Just wanted to say I see you in my future 🔮👀. [11] X Research source Send a 🐕 emoji. Then say, “Dexter! Get back here. Sorry, he must like you as much as I do.”

steps.title: Compare him to something you both love to create an instant inside joke.
steps.content: Compare him to something you both love to create an instant inside joke. If you both love mint chip ice cream, tell him he’s even sweeter. If you bonded over a specific band, tell him that when he sings in the shower, he puts the lead singer to shame. “You’re smoother than a caramel macchiato.” “I like you almost as much as I like Late Night at Ozzy’s Diner.”

steps.title: Who says you can’t be funny and romantic at the same time?
steps.content: Who says you can’t be funny and romantic at the same time? Send him a message that’s funny on the outside, but genuine on the inside by letting him know you appreciate him. [12] X Research source Everyone likes to hear words of affirmation! [13] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 28 September 2021. As you create your message, be yourself, and let your unique sense of humor shine through. “Life without you is like a broken pencil…pointless.” If he’s not around, send him a photo of you next to an empty chair. Then, draw him into the photo in stick figure form and text, “Wish you were here!”

steps.title: Joke about how amazing you are for a sassy approach.
steps.content: Joke about how amazing you are for a sassy approach. People find a good sense of humor really attractive, and humor goes a long way towards building connection. [14] X Expert Source Julianne Cantarella Dating & Relationship Coach Expert Interview. 6 August 2021. It’s even better if you can show that you can joke about yourself, so step outside your comfort zone! Send a joke that lets him know you’re a total catch. “Sorry I wasn’t in your past. Can I make it up to you by being part of your future?” “Do you believe in love at first sight, or do I need to send you another pic?”

steps.title: Playfully tell him that he makes it hard to focus.
steps.content: Playfully tell him that he makes it hard to focus. You can use a text like this to make him feel special without having to get too emotional if deep conversations aren’t your vibe. That way, he’ll know that he’s been on your mind, but you’ll be able to keep the conversation light and funny. [15] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 28 September 2021. “My boss asked me why I’m so behind today. I told him I couldn’t stop thinking about you. JK. But seriously...” “Thinking about you all day has made my focus at work go 📉”

steps.title: Turn up the heat by sending a dirty joke.
steps.content: Turn up the heat by sending a dirty joke. You can let him know you’re thinking about him and looking forward to seeing him later for some quality alone time. Just be sure to hold off on sending a spicier message until you know that he’ll feel comfortable with it. “Liked your jeans today. Can’t wait to see them on the floor tonight.” “I was feeling a little off today… but don’t worry. You’ve turned me on again 😏” [16] X Research source
